019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal;
020
021import static java.lang.String.format;
022import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.Commons.retrieveText;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.composeTextKey;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.resolveText;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.TXT;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_Object_ARRAY;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.breakText;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
034
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Collection;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Optional;
040import java.util.ResourceBundle;
041import java.util.TreeMap;
042import java.util.stream.IntStream;
043import java.util.stream.Stream;
044import java.util.stream.Stream.Builder;
045
046import org.apiguardian.api.API;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIArgumentDefinition;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIDefinition;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIOptionDefinition;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
053
054/**
055 *  Builds the <i>usage</i> message that will be printed to the console (or
056 *  wherever) in case help is requested on the command line, or an invalid
057 *  option or argument is provided on it.
058 *
059 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
060 *  @version $Id: UsageBuilder.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $
061 *  @since 0.0.1
062 *
063 *  @UMLGraph.link
064 */
065@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UsageBuilder.java 1061 2023-09-25 16:32:43Z tquadrat $" )
066@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.1" )
067public class UsageBuilder
068{
069        /*-----------*\
070    ====** Constants **========================================================
071        \*-----------*/
072    /**
073     *  The maximum line length: {@value}.
074     */
075    public static final int MAX_LINE_LENGTH = 80;
076
077    /**
078     *  The Text 'Arguments'.
079     */
080    @Text
081    (
082        description = "The text that introduces the 'Arguments' section in the usage message.",
083        use = TXT,
084        id = "Arguments",
085        translations =
086        {
087            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Arguments" ),
088            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Argumente" )
089        }
090    )
091    public static final String TXT_Arguments = composeTextKey( UsageBuilder.class, TXT, "Arguments" );
092
093    /**
094     *  The text 'Options'.
095     */
096    @Text
097    (
098        description = "The text that introduces the 'Options' section in the usage message.",
099        use = TXT,
100        id = "Options",
101        translations =
102        {
103            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Options" ),
104            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Optionen" )
105        }
106    )
107    public static final String TXT_Options = composeTextKey( UsageBuilder.class, TXT, "Options" );
108
109    /**
110     *  The text 'Usage: ' that introduces the <i>usage</i> text.
111     */
112    @Text
113    (
114        description = "The text that introduces the usage message.",
115        use = TXT,
116        id = "Usage",
117        translations =
118        {
119            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Usage: " ),
120            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Verwendung: " )
121        }
122    )
123    public static final String TXT_Usage = composeTextKey( UsageBuilder.class, TXT, "Usage" );
124
125        /*------------*\
126    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
127        \*------------*/
128    /**
129     *  The resource bundle that is used to translate the descriptions of
130     *  options and arguments.
131     */
132    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
133    private final Optional<ResourceBundle> m_CallerResourceBundle;
134
135        /*--------------*\
136    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
137        \*--------------*/
138    /**
139     *  Creates a new {@code UsageBuilder} instance.
140     *
141     *  @param  callerResourceBundle   The resource bundle that is used to
142     *      translate the descriptions of options and arguments.
143     */
144    public UsageBuilder( final ResourceBundle callerResourceBundle )
145    {
146        this( Optional.ofNullable( callerResourceBundle ) );
147    }   //  UsageBuilder()
148
149    /**
150     *  Creates a new {@code UsageBuilder} instance.
151     *
152     *  @param  callerResourceBundle   The resource bundle that is used to
153     *      translate the descriptions of options and arguments.
154     */
155    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
156    public UsageBuilder( final Optional<ResourceBundle> callerResourceBundle )
157    {
158        m_CallerResourceBundle = requireNonNullArgument( callerResourceBundle, "resources" );
159    }   //  UsageBuilder()
160
161        /*---------*\
162    ====** Methods **==========================================================
163        \*---------*/
164    /**
165     *  Adds the arguments to the output.
166     *
167     *  @param  buffer  The buffer for the result.
168     *  @param  arguments   The arguments.
169     */
170    private void addArguments( final StringBuilder buffer, final Map<String, ? extends CLIArgumentDefinition> arguments )
171    {
172        if( !arguments.isEmpty() )
173        {
174            buffer.append( '\n' )
175                .append( retrieveText( TXT_Arguments ) )
176                .append( ':' );
177            @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent" )
178            final var widthLeft = arguments.values().stream()
179                .map( CLIDefinition::metaVar )
180                .mapToInt( String::length )
181                .max()
182                .getAsInt() + 2;
183            final var widthRight = MAX_LINE_LENGTH - widthLeft;
184
185            final List<String> leftLines = new ArrayList<>();
186            final List<String> rightLines = new ArrayList<>();
187
188            for( final var argument : arguments.values() )
189            {
190                leftLines.add( argument.metaVar() );
191
192                final var usageText = resolveMessage( m_CallerResourceBundle, argument );
193                rightLines.addAll( breakText( usageText, widthRight )
194                    .toList() );
195
196                padLines( leftLines, widthLeft, rightLines, widthRight );
197
198                buffer.append( IntStream.range( 0, leftLines.size() )
199                    .mapToObj( i -> leftLines.get( i ) + rightLines.get( i ) )
200                    .collect( joining( "\n", "\n", EMPTY_STRING ) ) );
201                leftLines.clear();
202                rightLines.clear();
203            }
204            buffer.append( '\n' );
205        }
206    }   //  addArguments()
207
208    /**
209     *  Adds the options to the output.
210     *
211     *  @param  buffer  The buffer for the result.
212     *  @param  options The options.
213     */
214    private void addOptions( final StringBuilder buffer, final Map<String, ? extends CLIOptionDefinition> options )
215    {
216        if( !options.isEmpty() )
217        {
218            buffer.append( "\n\n" )
219                .append( retrieveText( TXT_Options ) )
220                .append( ':' );
221            @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent" )
222            final var widthLeft = options.values().stream()
223                .flatMap( definition ->
224                {
225                    final Builder<String> builder = Stream.builder();
226                    builder.add( format( "%s %s", definition.name(), definition.metaVar() ) );
227                    for( final var a : definition.aliases() )
228                    {
229                        builder.add( format( "%s %s", a, definition.metaVar() ) );
230                    }
231                    return builder.build();
232                } )
233                .mapToInt( String::length )
234                .max()
235                .getAsInt() + 2;
236            final var widthRight = MAX_LINE_LENGTH - widthLeft;
237
238            final List<String> leftLines = new ArrayList<>();
239            final List<String> rightLines = new ArrayList<>();
240
241            for( final var option : options.values() )
242            {
243                leftLines.add( format( "%s %s", option.name(), option.metaVar() ) );
244                for( final var a : option.aliases() )
245                {
246                    leftLines.add( format( "%s %s", a, option.metaVar() ) );
247                }
248
249                final var usageText = resolveMessage( m_CallerResourceBundle, option );
250                rightLines.addAll( breakText( usageText, widthRight )
251                    .toList() );
252
253                padLines( leftLines, widthLeft, rightLines, widthRight );
254
255                buffer.append( IntStream.range( 0, leftLines.size() )
256                    .mapToObj( i -> leftLines.get( i ) + rightLines.get( i ) )
257                    .collect( joining( "\n", "\n", EMPTY_STRING ) ) );
258                leftLines.clear();
259                rightLines.clear();
260            }
261            buffer.append( '\n' );
262        }
263    }   //  addOptions()
264
265    /**
266     *  Builds the <i>usage</i> text.
267     *
268     *  @param  command The command string.
269     *  @param  definitions The CLI definitions.
270     *  @return The usage text.
271     */
272    public final String build( final CharSequence command, final Collection<? extends CLIDefinition> definitions )
273    {
274        final Map<String,CLIArgumentDefinition> arguments = new TreeMap<>();
275        final Map<String,CLIOptionDefinition> options = new TreeMap<>();
276
277        requireNonNullArgument( definitions, "definitions" ).forEach( definition ->
278        {
279            if( definition.isArgument() )
280            {
281                arguments.put( definition.getSortKey(), (CLIArgumentDefinition) definition );
282            }
283            else
284            {
285                options.put( definition.getSortKey(), (CLIOptionDefinition) definition );
286            }
287        } );
288
289        final var buffer = new StringBuilder( composeCommandLine( requireNotEmptyArgument( command, "command" ), options, arguments ) );
290        addOptions( buffer, options );
291        addArguments( buffer, arguments );
292
293        final var retValue = buffer.toString();
294
295        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
296        return retValue;
297    }   //  build()
298
299    /**
300     *  Composes the sample command line.
301     *
302     *  @param  command The command.
303     *  @param  options The options.
304     *  @param  arguments   The arguments.
305     *  @return The command line.
306     */
307    private final String composeCommandLine( final CharSequence command, final Map<String, ? extends CLIOptionDefinition> options, final Map<String, ? extends CLIArgumentDefinition> arguments )
308    {
309        final var buffer = new StringBuilder( retrieveText( TXT_Usage ) ).append( command );
310        for( final var definition : options.values() )
311        {
312            buffer.append( ' ' );
313            if( !definition.required() ) buffer.append( '[' );
314            buffer.append( definition.name() );
315            if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( definition.metaVar() ) )
316            {
317                buffer.append( '\u202f' )
318                    .append( definition.metaVar() );
319            }
320            if( !definition.required() ) buffer.append( ']' );
321        }
322        for( final var definition : arguments.values() )
323        {
324            buffer.append( ' ' );
325            if( !definition.required() ) buffer.append( '[' );
326            buffer.append( definition.metaVar() );
327            if( !definition.required() ) buffer.append( ']' );
328        }
329
330        final var retValue = breakText( buffer, MAX_LINE_LENGTH ).collect( joining( "\n" ) );
331
332        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
333        return retValue;
334    }   //  composeCommandLine()
335
336    /**
337     *  Ensures that the left and the right part have the same number of
338     *  entries and that the lines have the same length.
339     *
340     *  @param  leftLines   The lines on the left side.
341     *  @param  widthLeft   The length for the lines on the left side.
342     *  @param  rightLines  The lines on the right side.
343     *  @param  widthRight  The length for the lines on the right side.
344     */
345    private static final void padLines( final List<String> leftLines, final int widthLeft, final Collection<? super String> rightLines, @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final int widthRight )
346    {
347        switch( Integer.signum( leftLines.size() - rightLines.size() ) )
348        {
349            case -1:
350                while( leftLines.size() < rightLines.size() )
351                {
352                    leftLines.add( EMPTY_STRING );
353                }
354                break;
355
356            case 0: break;
357
358            case 1:
359                while( rightLines.size() < leftLines.size() )
360                {
361                    rightLines.add( EMPTY_STRING );
362                }
363                break;
364
365            default: break; // Cannot happen!!
366        }
367
368        final List<String> list = new ArrayList<>( leftLines );
369        leftLines.clear();
370        final var buffer = new StringBuilder( list.get( 0 ) );
371        while( buffer.length() < widthLeft - 2 ) buffer.append( ' ' );
372        buffer.append( ": " );
373        leftLines.add( buffer.toString() );
374
375        for( var i = 1; i < list.size(); ++i )
376        {
377            buffer.setLength( 0 );
378            buffer.append( list.get( i ) );
379            while( buffer.length() < widthLeft ) buffer.append( ' ' );
380            leftLines.add( buffer.toString() );
381        }
382    }   //  padLines()
383
384    /**
385     *  Returns the message from the given
386     *  {@link CLIDefinition}
387     *
388     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
389     *  @param  definition  The {@code CLIDefinition}.
390     *  @return The resolved message.
391     */
392    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
393    public final String resolveMessage( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final CLIDefinition definition )
394    {
395        final var retValue = resolveText( bundle, requireNonNullArgument( definition, "definition" ).usage(), definition.usageKey(), EMPTY_Object_ARRAY );
396
397        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
398        return retValue;
399    }   //  resolveMessage()
400}
401//  class UsageBuilder
402
403/*
404 *  End of File
